attributes.action: Spare Tyres Should Be Part Of An MOT
attributes.additional_details:
Increasingly car manufacturers are not supplying new cars with Spare Tyres and replacing them with sealant gel.

This gel only works under ideal conditions and isn't suitable for a large number or punctures. This means in the event of a puncture you have to call out the breakdown services.

Waiting for a patrol to arrive can take up to 2 hours leaving a car in potential danger on the side of the road, causing a hazard and inconvenience to other road users.

I believe this is dangerous and Spare tyres should be compulsory.
